system.requirements:
Tier 2; Clues from the Crowds, S 40 or WP 40, Interogation Skill.
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Social
system.effect: Character gains +10 to all Interrogation Tests, and an additional +5 for each other character participating in the Interrogation who also has this talent. This also counts as test assistance (an additional +10 if assiting character is trained in the skill and adjacent and in communication, and max of 2 assistants).
